name: Crazy Columns
overview: Another Amiga news story for you all, thanks to a heads up from our good friend and Twitch streamer Amiga Bill. As if you loved the 1984 game of Tetris or the 1989 game of Columns, you'll pleased to know that a brand new Amiga puzzler inspired by those games has been released for the Commodore Amiga 500 and above. This game named as 'Crazy Columns' is a puzzle game developed by Jochen Hoffer and team, and comes with all the features you would expect of a cool looking Column inspired game for your Amiga.
